panels.description: Estado das conexões com o database
panels.title: CONNECTION STATE

panels.description: Conexões com o database em timeout
panels.title: DB CONNECTION TIMEOUT

panels.description: Warnings e erros logados nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: WARN & ERROR LOG

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", area="nonheap"})* 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", area="nonheap"})

panels.description: Total de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS

panels.description: Número de erros 500 no último minuto
panels.title: ERROR 500

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: ERROR RATE

panels.description: Tempo de resposta da API no último minuto
panels.title: RESPONSE TIME

panels.description: Número de requisições por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons", method="GET"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons", method="GET"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons/{id}", method="GET"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons/{id}", method="GET"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons", method="POST"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons", method="POST"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons/{id}", method="PUT"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons/{id}", method="PUT"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons/{id}", method="DELETE"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="ms-launcher", instance="host.docker.internal:8080", job="ms-launcher", uri="/v1/persons/{id}", method="DELETE"}[1m])

panels.title: AVERAGE REQUEST DURATION
